seo.title: Digital Marketing & Creative Agency | Make It & Market
seo.description: Professional services for website development, graphic design, video editing, and trusted digital marketing strategies.
seo.keywords: SEO Services, Digital Marketing, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Website Development
seo.social_title: Make It & Market - Creative Solutions for Your Business
seo.social_description: Elevate your business with our creative services and digital marketing strategies.

hero.subtitle: Effective marketing solutions and versatile creative services for businesses, artists, and visionaries.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.description: Promotional work to target your audience through methods such as Google Ads, social media outreach, email blasts, and mass text messaging.

social_media.title: Social Media
social_media.description: All-around social media consulting, management, and content creation to assist with growing your audience engagement across all popular platforms.

web_app.title: Websites & Apps
web_app.description: Responsive web and app development to claim your place within the digital space, whether it's for business, pleasure, or a cause.

graphic_design.title: Graphic Design
graphic_design.description: Creative graphic design services spanning logos, flyers, books, film, PowerPoint, business cards, products, menus, and artwork.

video_editing.title: Video Editing
video_editing.description: Video editing for commercials, films, music videos, and social media. Services include cleanup, captions, color grading, music, sound, and effects.

animation.title: Animation
animation.description: Creating 2D and 3D animation revolved around characters, environments, modeling, motion, and conceptualizing to give life to your vision.
